trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Cornwall
There were no other sightings in Cornwall on or around July 16th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsWas on my way to get coffee with my girlfriend. 6:20am, July 18 2013. Perfectly clear sky. Noticed a huge star-like sphere in the sky with nothing else around it. It was way brighter than a morning star. I pointed it out to my girlfriend and about 3-5 sec after that, it grew very dim very quickly and took off leaving a small trail like that of a jet. This was a huge object and it was a different "white" than a normal shining star.
Summary: Huge bright star-like spere, no other visible stars. Dissapated and took off leaving trail.
